text: [Music]
my name is Sarah and I love to
sew a
lot I've been sewing since I was four
but I've gotten a lot better since then
my mom enrolled me in sewing classes
when I was 10 and I got to learn a lot
of new techniques now I teach people how
to sew one of my favorite things to do
now is upcycling upcycling is buying
clothes from the thrift store and
embellishing them into totally different
pieces and it's good for the
[Music]
environment I like that
one you buy things for not that much
money and customize it to make it look
unique I use animal print Fabrics Trims
and buttons to make them look cool I'll
either give it as a gift or I'll get
some friends together and we'll have a
fashion
[Music]
show people will say hey where didd you
get that I told them I'm sorry you can't
get it anywhere else it's a Sarah
original I could take my old clothes
upcycle them and it's like brand new
it's like I bought it from the
store my dream is to open up a nonprofit
that will teach kids how to sell and
